input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Melrose International Frosted Winterberry Wreath, 26-Inch

Item specifications:
Cedar, with laurel leaves and clumps of white berries with just a light dusting of snow
All stems are wired for easy shaping to full size
Suitable for use inside or outside in a protected area
This wreath adds a touch of warmth to any room or door

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This wreath is made of cedar with laurel leaves and clumps of white berries with a light dusting of snow.  All stems are wired for easy shaping to full size.  It can be used inside or outside in a protected area.  This wreath adds a touch of warmth to any room or door.
input_text.Response B: This stunning wreath is a classic holiday decoration that will add beauty to your home. The combination of frosted winterberry, laurel leaves, and clumps of white berries with just a light dusting of snow makes for a beautiful and unique display. The wreath is made with durable materials and can be used inside or outside in a protected area, making it a versatile and long-lasting decoration. Its elegant design is sure to complement any decor and create a festive and inviting atmosphere.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
